price: Adeε biara nnihͻ a εtoo no na egyaee no, na mmom ebubuu mu yεε no muhumuhu tesε nsoo (anaa kasεε a ahunu).
arabic: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيۡءٍ أَتَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتۡهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā tadharu min shayin atat ʿalayhi illā jaʿalathu kal-ramīmi
